title: Academy at Tolaria West
subtitle: Plane - Dominaria
planeText: At the beginning of your end step, if you have no cards in hand, draw seven cards.
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, discard your hand.

title: Akoum
subtitle: Plane - Zendikar
planeText: Players may cast enchantment spells as though they had flash.
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, destroy target creature that isn’t enchanted.

title: Fields of Summer
subtitle: Plane - Moag
planeText: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may gain 2 life.
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, you may gain 10 life.

title: Gavony
subtitle: Plane - Innistrad
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

title: Prahv
subtitle: Plane - Ravnica
planeText: If you cast a spell this turn, you can’t attack with creatures. If you attacked with creatures this turn, you can’t cast spells.
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, you gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.

title: Takenuma
subtitle: Plane - Kamigawa
planeText: Whenever a creature leaves the battlefield, its controller draws a card.
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, return target creature you control to its owner’s hand.

title: Tazeem
subtitle: Plane - Zendikar
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, draw a card for each land you control.

title: The Fourth Sphere
subtitle: Plane - Phyrexia
planeText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a nonblack creature.
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

title: The Great Forest
subtitle: Plane - Lorwyn
planeText: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, creatures you control get +0/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

title: Undercity Reaches
subtitle: Plane - Ravnica
planeText: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
chaosText: Whenever chaos ensues, you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
